title: Vanishing Beauty: Asian Jewelry and Ritual Objects from the Barbara and David Kipper Collection
short_description: More than 300 highlights from this outstanding collection introduce visitors to exquisite meaning-filled objects and the fast-disappearing cultures that produced them.
